mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(0) skunum,SUM(amount) amount,ifnull(sum(weight),0) weight FROM ( SELECT msku,SUM(amount) amount, sum(amount*(case when ifnull(d.length,0)*ifnull(d.width,0)*ifnull(d.height,0)/5000>ifnull(d.weight,0) then ifnull(d.length,0)*ifnull(d.width,0)*ifnull(d.height,0)/5000 else ifnull(d.weight,0) end )) weight from t_amz_product_sales_plan_ship_item i left join t_erp_material m on m.sku=i.msku and m.shopid=#{shopid,jdbcType=CHAR} and m.isdelete=0 left join t_dimensions d on d.id=m.pkgDimensions WHERE i.groupid=#{groupid,jdbcType=CHAR} and i.warehouseid=#{warehouseid,jdbcType=CHAR} AND i.shopid=#{shopid,jdbcType=CHAR} GROUP BY msku ) v
mapper.update: update t_amz_product_sales_plan_ship_item set batchnumber=#{batchnumber,jdbcType=CHAR} where id=#{id,jdbcType=CHAR}
